reviewPlaceholder: Describe your experience with this renter...
propertyReviewPlaceholder: Describe your experience with this property...
wouldRentAgain: Would you rent to this renter again?
photoDescription: Upload photos of the property condition at the end of the lease (max 5)
propertyPhotoDescription: Upload photos of the property to share your experience (max 5)
reviewPolicyText1: Reviews should be honest, specific, and constructive. Focus on the renter's behavior as a tenant, not personal matters.
reviewPolicyText2: Photos should only document the property's condition and should not include personal items or information.
reviewPolicyText3: Inappropriate or discriminatory reviews may be removed without notice.
propertyReviewPolicyText1: Reviews should be honest, specific, and constructive. Focus on the property and your experience living there.
propertyReviewPolicyText2: Photos should be relevant to your review and should not include people or private information.
propertyReviewPolicyText3: Inappropriate or misleading reviews may be removed without notice.
reviewSubmissionFailed: Failed to submit review. Please try again.
reviewTextRequired: Please write at least 10 characters in your review.
wouldRentAgainRequired: Please indicate whether you would rent to this renter again.
maxImagesReached: You can upload a maximum of 5 images.
imagePermissionDenied: We need permission to access your photos.
imageUploadFailed: Failed to upload image. Please try again.
responseTextPlaceholder: Provide your response to this review...
reviewResponseFailed: Failed to submit response. Please try again.
reviewTimeWindow: You can write a review within 30 days after the lease end date.
